body.name: Graco Melrose 5-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer (Black)
features: 5-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (compatible toddler guardrails sold separately), daybed, and full-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (conversion kit sold separately); Assembly required

FULL-SIZE STORAGE DRAWER: Crib includes full-size under-crib storage drawer with 2 separate compartments, allowing you to conveniently store and organize your nursery items and kids bedroom essentials

5 DIFFERENT MATTRESS HEIGHT OPTIONS: Including an innovative "newborn" height option to conveniently provide parents with an easier access to their newborn; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress (mattress sold separately)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards
QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment
body.description: Bring your dream nursery to life with the Graco® Melrose 5-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer. With its timeless, versatile design, the Melrose is the perfect addition to any nursery – and easy to match with any style. The Melrose is crafted from sustainable New Zealand pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites, includes Euro drawer glides, and its applied finish has been tested to meet or exceed the applicable ASTM and CPSIA safety standards. The Graco® Melrose 5-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer is GREENGUARD Gold Certified — Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air. Also, the Melrose is JPMA Certified — meaning it’s been expert tested by third-party, accredited laboratories to meet or exceed all of the applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards. Designed to adapt to your growing baby, the Melrose is equipped with an adjustable mattress support base with 4 different height options – meaning, the height of the mattress support base can be lowered as your child grows (please note, this crib may only be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35 inches). To support your child’s journey from babyhood to toddlerhood and beyond, the Melrose is able to be converted from a crib to a toddler bed (compatible with 1 or 2 toddler guardrails, each sold separately), daybed, and full-size bed with headboard and optional footboard (compatible full-size conversion kit sold separately). The Graco® Melrose 5-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer is designed to accommodate any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress (mattress sold separately – we recommend any Graco® crib mattress to pair with your Melrose). Graco® is the proud recipient of the Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s bedroom furniture, and the 2023 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture. Backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer’s warranty. Assembly required. Mattress sold separately.
